long_description: Pack a small sandwich or take along a side salad or some fruit as you head to work with the medium REI eCycle Food Container. Made from recycled and recyclable polypropylene plastic; polypropylene plastic is 100% BPA free. Leakproof lid keeps your lunch from spilling on the way to work. Medium container holds 14.5 fl. oz. Nests with other sizes of eCycle containers (sold separately). REI eCycle Food Container is dishwasher and microwave safe.
short_description: Pack a small sandwich or take along a side salad or some fruit as you head to work with the medium REI eCycle Food Container.
